build on.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to base something on an idea or thing
build on.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Our relationship is built on trust.
build on.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to use your achievements as a base for further development
build on.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The new plan will build on the success of the previous programme.
build on.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to add another room to a building in order to have more space
build on.translation[0].definitions[2].e: We’re planning to build on a conservatory.
